description: The research course will involve an observational study of the 90 ponies that range freely on 40 acres at Penn'sNew Bolton Center in Kennett Square, PA (for for information see http://www.upenn.edu/spotlights/studying-behavior-penn-s-semi-feral-horse-herd The course is tentatively scheduled for Fridays, 11 AM-5 PM and can accommodate 4-5 students. Enrollment is by permission of the instructors. Interested students should contact either Dr. Cheney cheney@sas.upenn.edu or Dr.Seyfarth seyfarth@psych.upenn.edu directly.
name: RES.EXP.ANIMAL BEHAVIOR
